title: BRIEF-Transcanada Announces Completion Of NGTL Export Capacity Open Season
text: March 20, 2018 / 4:29 PM / in 12 minutes BRIEF-Transcanada Announces Completion Of NGTL Export Capacity Open Season Reuters Staff March 20 (Reuters) - Transcanada Corp: * TRANSCANADA ANNOUNCES SUCCESSFUL COMPLETION OF NGTL EXPORT CAPACITY OPEN SEASON * ‍NGTL EXPORT CAPACITY OPEN SEASON CLOSED ON MARCH 15 AND WAS OVERSUBSCRIBED, WITH AVERAGE AWARDED CONTRACT TERM OF ABOUT 22 YRS * ‍NOVA GAS TRANSMISSION LTD IS WORKING TO FINALIZE SCOPE OF EXPANSION FACILITIES TO MEET SERVICE REQUIREMENTS RESULTING FROM OPEN SEASON​ * ‍NGTL ANTICIPATES AN EXPANSION INVESTMENT OF APPROXIMATELY $120 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
